description.text: JJUG CCC is the largest Java community event organized by Japan Java User Group (JJUG). It provides great sessions of Java-related technologies and practices, and brings together Java engineers from different disciplines.This conference will be held online.

data.hashtag: We will also use separate hashtags for each session

about.text1: The Japan Java User Group (JJUG) is the largest Java community in Japan with over 10000 Java engineers. The following activities are conducted.

data.jjugccc: Full-day conference held twice a year (Spring and Autumn)
data.instructorDispatch: Dispatch of instructors to local Java communities in Japan
data.internationalConferences: Making a relationship with international Java Communities
